article: chinese commerce minister bo xilai friday sent a message to his zambian counterpart dipak patel to express sympathy and condolences over the death of ## zambian workers in an explosion wednesday at a factory partly owned by a chinese company .
abstract: chinese commerce minister expresses sympathy to zambia over factory explosion
